title: Negotiator
overview:
Tong Wei is a genius negotiator who is the star of the US-China Business
 Council. Male lead Xie Xiaofei also works as a negotiator, but is 
actually the sole heir of a wealthy Chinese-American corporation who 
wants nothing to do with the family business. He vents his frustrations 
on Tong Wei, though their bickering relationship soon takes a romantic 
turn. The couple separates after Tong Wei discovers the Xie Family had ahand in her parents' deaths, only to meet several years later as negotiators of rival firms.
